121820000.text: Everyone! Something terrible has happened! Huohuo is missing!

121820001.text: What? Did she say where she was going before she left yesterday?

121820002.text: No, she didn't. Now think about it, something's been off with her since yesterday.

121820006.text: Calling out to her in the group chat won't help. We should contact Hanya right away.

121820008.text: Let's meet at the usual place

121820009.text: Our ghost-hunting squad can't afford to lose any members!

121820014.text: I've already published a post! Since you're here, let's give it a quick once-over.

121820012.text: Just stop "@"-ing people and come to Fyxestroll Garden.

121950000.text: I asked the person who made the post, and they said we could find the couple in the Aurum Alley.

121950001.text: Sounds cool. Nothing like the fruitless investigation I'm caught up in.

121950002.text: I came across a post about an ancient guqin that all of a sudden started playing a mournful melody all on its own. And guess what?

121950003.text: Come on, don't keep me in suspense.

121950004.text: Turns out it's just an ancient battery-powered guqin. And a nosy someone recently gave it a new battery

121950006.text: Looks like {NICKNAME} has found something really strange.

122010000.text: Guinaifen has invited you, Sushang, and Huohuo to the group chat.

122010004.text: Hello! This is {NICKNAME}. Glad to e-meet you all!

122010005.text: Hey, guys! This is Huohuo. Glad to e-meet you all!

122010017.text: I won't keep you any longer since we're all tired! I just have one thing to say!

122010018.text: Our post today is blowing up! It's got tons of comments and reposts and has become one of the hottest posts today!

122010023.text: Yeah, everyone go take a look

122010022.text: I'm going to check it out on the Ghostly Grove now!

122010007.text: So, what group chat is this?
122010007.option: So, what group chat is this?

122010008.text: The ghost-hunting squad's group chat, of course!

122010010.text: You've only just joined us and wanna leave already? Fine, let me help you with that.

122010011.text: You have been removed from the group chat.

122010014.text: Guinaifen has invited you to the group chat.

122010016.text: Alright, enough with messing around. Let's get down to business.

122060000.text: Why don't we start with Huohuo and talk about what we did today?

122060001.text: Today we sealed the heliobus Keralum. Thanks for all the help, everybody.

122060002.text: By the way, Miss Qingque looked so cool~

122060007.text: Well, let me tell you something funny.

122060008.text: A while back, I got this message from someone accusing me of plagiarizing their shop-review videos. They even threatened to take legal action if I didn't respond right away

122060009.text: I simply replied, "Nah, it's my own stuff from last year."

122060010.text: Then they argued that there's no statute of limitations for plagiarism, and whether I uploaded the video <unbreak>10</unbreak> years ago or <unbreak>100</unbreak> years ago, it should still count as plagiarism.

122060011.text: You're being blackmailed. What a stroke of bad luck...
122060011.option: What a stroke of bad luck...

122060012.text: Bad luck? Hah, I couldn't care less.

122060013.text: Let's not forget that we're internet famous now! We've dealt with all sorts of things.

122060016.text: Why don't you go check our follower count? I'm feeling like I'm floating on cloud nine now.

122060017.text: You've been floating there for a while

122060018.text: You've been floating there for a while

122060019.text: You've been floating there for a while
122060019.option: You've been floating there for a while

122060021.text: Don't forget to go check it!

122060020.text: I'm floating on cloud nine, too!
122060020.option: I'm floating on cloud nine, too!

122060014.text: That means you're famous now, Little Gui.

122070002.text: I feel like that boy Yanqing didn't use his full strength at all

122070020.text: It's like a kind of willpower that can only be cultivated after experiencing countless battles

122070003.text: I don't understand you martial arts guys.

122070004.text: I'm so tired, Little Gui. Maybe you should talk about account-related stuff

122070021.text: We got lots of different gifts sent by fans

122070014.text: Sushang is exhausted and probably asleep by now.

122070016.text: Then it's just the three of us celebrating our success.

122070008.text: I'm a trendsetter, not a sheep. So I won't follow suit and say "Yay"

122080000.text: The general's Lightning-Lord is so cool

122080002.text: So cool. This is my first time seeing it

122080003.text: Every time I see the Lightning-Lord appear, I feel it's super cool

122080011.text: Let's get back to the topic. Well, congrats to Huohuo for getting Tail back!

122080012.text: Yeah, who would've thought that Tail was with Hanya?

122080013.text: I heard it took Tail a long time to recover. Must have been tough.

122080014.text: Hold on, something just crossed my mind.

122080015.text: Are you planning to take a photo of Tail?

122080018.text: Don't push yourself, Huohuo. Feel free to speak up if you disagree.

122080022.text: Well, if Mr. Tail isn't interested, that's fine. We have plenty of other topics to discuss.

122080023.text: First things first, let's check our account now.

122080020.text: Why don't you ask Tail first? What does he say?
122080020.option: What does Tail say about this?

122080021.text: Oh, Mr. Tail says he's not interested.

122080007.text: I've seen it so many times, it does nothing to me now

130200001.text: It's so quiet, and no one's real chatty in here. So different from some other general chat groups

130200002.text: Hm, maybe everyone's busy with their own thing

130200003.text: Oh, yeah, busy is good, busy is great

130200006.text: @{NICKNAME} @Huohuo Come in, our Little Gui requires your presence and care

130200008.text: They were just trying to get someone to chat with them

130200011.text: This is the Ghost-Hunting Squad Comms

130200012.text: I understand, we're the ones who need to scram

130200014.text: It's common sense that in ghost-hunting squad, you DO NOT talk about ghosts

130200030.text: This ghost-hunting squad group is never meant to be a serious work chat only

130200016.text: I think these two were just so bored, they're fishing for chats. Huohuo, don't bite

130200019.text: No way no way no way

130200021.text: If I knew earlier, I'd have stopped her (TдT)

130200022.text: Little Gui made me do it (TдT)

130200023.text: Sorry I couldn't foil her plans (TдT)

130200024.text: Are you upset Huohuo? (TдT) You prolly are (TдT)

130200025.text: I—I—I'm not upset, no need to feel so bad about it

130200026.text: I want to chat too, let's have a nice, long chat

130200029.text: I didn't think Miss Guinaifen would specifically ask

130200101.text: I want to recommend my way of relaxing to everyone

130200102.text: In Starskiff Haven, find a place you can see the skiff lane and just space out!

130200103.text: ...You can do that at the Sleepless Earl too

130200104.text: Looking at the starskiffs passing by

130200105.text: You won't even know how much time has passed

130200110.text: I'm a little concerned about your mental wellbeing, Huohuo

130200111.text: We'll go try it out, but you know you are safe to talk to us, right, Huohuo?

130200117.text: I've already been here for almost half a day, it's very relaxing

130200123.text: Mr. Xiyan came over, gave me a pocket full of candies without saying anything, and left

130200125.text: This proves that you're adorable. If I were nearby, I would've given you some candies too

130200128.text: Like how people can't help themselves but feed the koi fish in the pond?

130200130.text: No one is discouraged from feeding Huohuo

130200133.text: I have some candies too. Where are you Huohuo?

130200134.text: I have candies too! Full speed ahead!

130200136.text: No need to come here, I've already left

130200126.text: Huohuo, you kept staring at starskiffs and must've looked very pitiable

130200127.text: Every compassionate person would want to do something for you

130200112.text: It's like listening to the sound of rainfall to destress

130200115.text: A little concerned for both of your mental wellbeing

130200116.text: Hey, if you have anything to share, you know you are safe to talk to us, right?

130200201.text: Who wants some milk tea? I ordered 2 extra. First come, first served

130200216.text: Sorry, you don't get one this time, but I'll treat you next time

130200217.text: Remember that. I already wrote it down

130200218.text: If you don't keep your promise, karma's a witch

130200223.text: What about just give them both to me, then there's no need to choose

130200227.text: The two teas fell on the ground and spilled

130200229.text: Don't worry about giving each other the tea, I'll treat you all

130200224.text: I can't have them, it's yours

130200220.text: Really, it's fine, don't worry about it

130200209.text: Were you two staring at your jade abaci the whole time?

130200213.text: You let three people fight for two teas, causing a rift in our friendship

130200214.text: How are you going to make up for it

130200301.text: Little Gui, you've really gone viral

130200303.text: How did you JUST find out?

130200305.text: I went to Aurum Alley today, and everyone there is talking about you

130200306.text: I heard she's viral, but to be honest, I didn't really feel it

130200308.text: You need to go online more

130200315.text: They're saying Little Gui announced during her live stream that she's going to stop her activities, and they're guessing the reason behind it

130200325.text: Sushang you almost made me blank out

130200326.text: You're saying that the word on the street is that I was going to quit, right?

130200330.text: My goodness, neither of you even watched my stream. Did you watch my stream, {NICKNAME}?

130200331.text: Sorry, I don't usually watch the stream either

130200337.text: Come to think of it, this might make good content

130200338.text: Hmph, I will passionately debunk the fake news in my live stream tonight

130200333.text: I watched the stream. Little Gui totally said that

130200334.text: What kind of a fake stream did you watch?

130200335.text: I watched it. Little Gui didn't say anything like that

130200321.text: What do you mean "What!?", Sushang? Aren't you the one who told us this

130200322.text: I was shocked that you didn't know

130200323.text: I love it when people say, "WHAT!?"
130200323.option: I love it when they say "WHAT!?"

130200309.text: Could you have misheard them, Sushang? Maybe they were saying something else instead, like "goodnight fam", not "Guinaifen"?

130200310.text: No way, I'm sure it's me!

130200311.text: Is this what it's like to be a celebrity?
130200311.option: Is this what fame feels like?

130200312.text: Celebrity whaaat, it's just my name

130200313.text: Keep going, and I'll start to swell up with pride, hahaha

130200401.text: I was window shopping with Huohuo earlier and ran into some people she knew

130200403.text: And the other person didn't know what to say either

130200404.text: It looked a little awkward, so I tried to bridge the conversation

130200405.text: And I found that they're all really personable

130200406.text: Sushang even got them to agree to have dinner together later

130200408.text: I knew Sushang's social skills were only second to mine

130200411.text: Miss Sushang was incredible! Not like me...

130200413.text: Come and hang out with us more. With both of us as your wingwomen, you will definitely overcome your social anxiety and become the biggest extrovert in the Ten-Lords Commission

130200415.text: Huohuo becoming a big extrovert. What kind of dream am I living thru?

130200416.text: This doesn't sound like a good thing

130200422.text: Thank you for your concern, everyone, but I don't want to be an extrovert yet...

130200423.text: I just want to be able to start and carry a conversation with people I'm familiar with

130200425.text: So come to the dinner! It's just us and the people we met earlier. I'll be your support

130200427.text: I'm sorry, the user you're trying to reach is currently out of the service area. Please try again later.

130200434.text: Looks like we have to take it slow

130200432.text: Looks like Huohuo can't go. I'll go to the dinner

130200433.text: Of four people, three must be extroverts. And guess what? I won't say who's not one of them

130200417.text: Y'know, forcing an introvert into an extrovert ain't gonna fly

130200418.text: Simply put, you're just putting Huohuo in a difficult situation

130200419.text: Huohuo, there comes a time for everyone to improve themselves. Maybe yours is now!

130200421.text: No no no, can't do it

130200410.text: What Huohuo struggled to do came so naturally for Sushang
